technique.short-name: Failure of 1.4.2 due to playing a sound longer than 3 seconds where there is no mechanism to turn it off

applicability.p: Applies to all technologies except those for voice interaction.

description.p: This describes a failure condition for Success Criteria involving sound. If sound does not turn off automatically within 3 seconds and there is no way to turn the sound off then Success Criterion 1.4.2 would not be met. Sounds that play over 3 seconds when there is no mechanism to turn off the sound included in the content would fall within this failure condition.

item.p: A site that plays continuous background music
A site with a narrator that lasts more than 3 seconds before stopping, and there is no mechanism to stop it.
Check that there is a way in a Web page to turn off any sound that plays automatically for more than three seconds.
If step #1 is not true then content fails Success Criterion 1.4.2
